Replace.Text: Baie

In Xindan at the end of the world, the hero raised his sword reflecting the twilight, fighting and chasing the dusk night. Bai E's chest is dancing with shining stars, his eyes are burning like the dead sun disk, shooting silver needles towards the barren land. He hid his name, kept silent, buried the past in the hometown solidified in his memory, and vowed to defend the new dawn to the death. Even if that dawn will burn everything.
The fire that accommodates the "negative world"

After every 20 rounds, Bai E will embark on the "Eternal Return". During this period, Bai E can collect a fire ability each round. After collecting the fire, Baie will transform into Caeslana and immediately form an army with all combat units. Each time Eternal Calamity returns, Bai E gets +10% of all great man points and -20% of war exhaustion. After the war weariness is completely eliminated, all units will have +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength +2 [ICON_Movement] movement strength. Moreover, as reincarnations intertwine, the fire may become more and more bright...
kauslana

After transformation, gain damage value equal to the number of completed "Eternal Returns". If you have the civilization characteristic building "Destruction", the damage value acquisition efficiency will be +100%. When a city produces a unit, it gets a copy of the unit based on the damage value.
Creation Vortex Heart

Baie characteristic area, replacing the municipal square. [NEWLINE] In addition to the original bonuses, after completion, you will also get policy card effects unlocked through municipal administration or technology. The policy card effects obtained in this way will not expire and can be superimposed with the policy card itself. Unlocks the city's ability to produce Goldenborn.

"Negative World" [NEWLINE] provides research progress, municipal progress, faith value, gold coins for civilization based on the total number of fires, and provides production progress for all cities.
"Sky" [NEWLINE] heals all own units. The healed units will provide experience points to themselves and surrounding units.
「海洋」[NEWLINE]已改良的奢侈品+1 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度+1 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值+1 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。
"The Land" [NEWLINE] Improved bonus resources +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
"Years" [NEWLINE] repeatedly obtains a fire effect from the past.
"Years" [NEWLINE] repeatedly obtains a fire effect from the past. [NEWLINE][COLOR_Civ6Red]You must already own a Tinder[ENDCOLOR]

"Law"[NEWLINE]According to the number of fires, strategic resources are obtained from unlocked and military policy cards within the government, gold coins are obtained from economic policy cards, envoys, governor points and faith values ​​are obtained from foreign policy cards, and great man points, technology values ​​and culture are obtained from wildcard policy cards.

"Gateway" [NEWLINE] The Goldens already owned can open the Hundred Realms Gate. After the Hundred Realms Gate is opened, other Goldens can no longer open the Hundred Realms Gate, but all units can be teleported to the location of the unit that opened the Hundred Realms Gate each round. The Goldens who have opened the Hundred Realms Gate can lead surrounding units back to the nearest own city at any time.

"Trick" [NEWLINE] Immediately obtain era points for the current round number and the total amount of fire collected, and immediately obtain gold coins that are the product of the number of activated trade routes, the number of spies owned, and the total amount of fire collected.

"Death" [NEWLINE] After the death of a friendly unit in this round, the faith value equal to the number of rounds * 16% of the productivity required to produce the unit will be returned, and 1 additional combat power will be provided to all friendly units.

"Dispute" [NEWLINE] resets the movement and attack times of all your units, and gives all your units a combat effectiveness equal to the number of reincarnations. Killing units will also gain general points.

"Romantic" [NEWLINE] +8% encouragement, immediately obtain 8 items of encouragement, and provide municipal progress equal to the total number of fires. If the "rational" fire has been activated this cycle, the effect will be doubled.

"Rationality" [NEWLINE] +8% Eureka, immediately obtain 8 Eureka items, providing research progress equal to the total number of fires. If the "Romance" fire has been activated this cycle, the effect will be doubled.
+{Num} comes from the selected fire effect.
Open the Gate of Hundred Realms
Return to nearest city
Teleport to the location of Baijiemen
Use fire to create the world again.
12 fire types need to be collected

In order to achieve [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]Fire Collection[ENDCOLOR] victory, you need to use Baier (demigod) to collect 12 fires. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] It is recommended to use Bai E (demigod) to play the game.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] The fire required to win the fire collection:
Number of fire types owned:
You have collected all the fire, and we look forward to meeting you in the new world.
